name: Vivid IoV Labs
slogan: Live streaming on demand platform with enhanced web monetisation functions
description:
Vivid revolutionises how content creators get rewarded for live streaming. Incumbents take 50% from creators revenues, depriving them of $1.5bn earnings per year. With Vivid, creators can answer user requests or set terms for their own content. This method allows users to get paid fairly rather than having to resort to clickbait tactics to entice viewers with a cluttered ad-driven experience.

We are also creating standalone tools to enhance Web Monetisation tech incl. 1) enabling users to stream micropayments P2P with a crypto address-free interface using $ and usernames & 2) pooling & splitting payments e.g. top sharers of quality content get rewarded.

team.name: Greg Hannam
team.bioHtml: Pathologically curious. Solving big problems through technology. Operations and products now previously Engineer and BI Consultant.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
We are looking for mostly technical skills as per below, however if you think you could add something we would be pleased to hear from you!

The following skills or experience are our priorities:

Vue JS experience or willing to learn
Node JS experience or willing to learn
Live video streaming experience or similar production environment:

Understanding of video technologies including: encoding, compression, streaming, formats, bit-rates, multicasting.
Understanding of HTTP Live Streaming (HLS), MPEG Dash specification, RTMP and RTSP
Understanding of video codecs such as H.264/AVC and H.265/HEVC
Understanding of systems for over-the-top (OTT) delivery
Appreciation for Digital Rights Management (DRM) solutions (e.g. Marlin, CENC, FairPlay)
Experience of encoding hardware / software, i.e. ffmpeg, Harmonic, Elemental
Blockchain:

Interledger JS experience or willing to learn
Rust / Solidity Smart Contract experience or willing to learn
Design:

UI/UX experience including HTML + CSS skills
Equally important is being a complementary fit into the team.

Interpersonal:

Motivated - you will be in frequent communication with your teammates, but the ability to work autonomously is key
Flexible - expect lots to change as we navigate uncharted waters, we approach every challenge with an open mind
Active listener - allow the speaker to fully engage, but always willing to put your own ideas forward
Teamwork - not afraid to chip in and get involved in anything to help the progress of the company
Responsible - take ownership and acts in the best interests of the company & its values
Dependable - consistent in your approach and a reliable pair of hands under pressure is of the utmost importance for us as we move quickly
